snippet: While a group of editors embraced some recommendations from a recent report, they rejected a state-sanctioned oversight system.
abstract: Editors of Britain's principal national newspapers meet under pressure from Prime Min David Cameron and agree to establishment of independent news media regulator with far greater powers than those available to existing watchdog; editors reject state-sanctioned oversight system.
lead_paragraph: While a group of editors embraced some recommendations from a recent report, they rejected a state-sanctioned oversight system.

headline.seo: British News Media Agree to More Powerful Regulator
headline.print_headline: British News Media Agree to Regulator

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
